actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Armed Services (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-305.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Armed Services.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-305) Authorizes the appropriation of an amount not to exceed $533,300 to the Senate Committee on Armed Services for inquiries and investigations from March 1, 1975, through February 28, 1976. Directs the allocation of such funds to specific areas of investigation.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Armed Services.
